title: One Physician's Office WhereClaim Forms Aren't Doctored
author: Anita SharpeStaff Reporter
cleaned_text: Jan. 5, 1998 12:01 am ET DENVER -- Two years ago, Rob Gleser was a loyal foot soldier in the for-profit health-care revolution. Working for Columbia/HCA Healthcare Corp., which had acquired control of his practice, Dr. Gleser spent his days meeting with doctor groups trying to get them to affiliate with the big hospital company.
